review: Overall performance is pretty average. Heats up badly if usage is heavy. If you are someone who plays games on your phone, this phone is not for you. Heats up and battery drains pretty fast. It's an okay phone for moderate usage.

It's been a satisfying 1 year woh the G4, only pros wil be the camera degrading day by day and now it's almost like a VGA compare to the 16 MP shooter earlier, all and all if you are looking for an Android phone with good stock Android experience, MOTO is for you

review: It has a life of 8 months, I dragged it on to an year though
Please find below the pro an cons
Cons:
1. Not worth the price listed here
2. Heats a lot, the screen would malfunction within months and I could not absolutely use it outside under the sunlight
3. The charger malfunctioned after 10 months,it just stopped with no damage to it, within the next 12 months had to replace 4 chargers, it somehow damaged all chargers
4. Gave up on the phone when the power button broke after 12 months and 3 days, it just fell off.

5. It is made to last an year, year and a half top, I had 3 of my friends using the same phone, all are on the verge of getting a new phone not because they got bored but because the phone became a drag
Pro:
1.Great camera
2. Does not hang, ever
3. Turbo charger
I like the phone and its overall experience is good. Just the packing of the product by amazon was very bad. It didnt even look like it contain a 15k phone in it.
The phone is working very well and is as promised. I have used it for a while now and is working upto the expectation.
pros: 1. good phone for light used
2. Fast
3. good display quality
4. music play back is also very good.
5. good camera quality for the price range.
cons: 1. its battery life sucks
2. it is not so gud at gaming
so overall this product is not for heavy user for gaming etc.. it can be used for regular light use...

It's been 4 months since I have been using this phone, and  I will like to say that it's was a really good experience. While ordering I didn't know how the phone will turn out to be but it was above my expectations.  Amazon delivery was within a week. It is user friendly and above all value for money.
Pros: Good quality camera
Fingerprint sensor is fast and accurate.
Doesn't get hang.
Strong battery life, gets full 100% charge in 1 hour.
Cons: Speaker volume is low when u used it for Video call.
Only gets heated when u keep it for charging. Otherwise No heating problem found.

I ordered this phone but received a defective piece. Amazon did take the phone back and refunded the amount paid. I reordered the phone and again got a defective piece. This time the camera was not working.

Bought this product in Jan. It worked good for 3 months then microphone problem, Over heating problem, No battery backup. If you give your phone for service they won't return your phone even after a month. Worst phone I ever used and the worst service by service center people.
Bought this 1 and half year back.. but after sometime the screen burn is regular and camera lens is also gone.. front camera looks better than back now.. had a good run..
Awesome mobile....I use it continuously for 5-6 hours..neither heats nor battery goes down.
Phone is ok but I have found two disqualities i.e. 1) If I talked or surfing net it's become very hot, even at the time of phone charging. I feel very afraid.
2) Headphone jack is very problematic. It's not working.

Well it is late to post since it's been more than a week, the product and service are extremely awesome. But buying such a costly phone it did not support screen cast, also Anycast dongle does not work. Rest all is fine.

It is average though! It heats up a lot while playing games. Rear camera is good and front is quite standard. Look is not so attractive. It's good sides are Corning's Gorilla Glass protection, turbo charging facility and you can upgrade to android Naugut as well.
